name: package-managers
description: Essential Linux package managers: APT, Snap, and Flatpak

apt.name: apt
apt.description: Advanced Package Tool for Debian/Ubuntu systems

commands.install: sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y apt
commands.update: sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y

commands.install: sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y snapd
sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y flatpak

nvm.name: nvm
nvm.description: Node Version Manager for Linux to manage multiple Node.js versions

nodejs.name: nodejs
nodejs.description: JavaScript runtime (from NVM if available, otherwise via APT)

commands.install: if command -v nvm >/dev/null 2>&1; then nvm install --lts && nvm use --lts; else sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y nodejs npm; fi
commands.remove: if command -v nvm >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo 'Use nvm to uninstall specific Node versions (e.g., nvm uninstall <version>)'; else sudo apt remove -y nodejs npm; fi
commands.update: if command -v nvm >/dev/null 2>&1; then nvm install --lts && nvm use --lts; else sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y nodejs npm; fi

commands.install: if command -v npm >/dev/null 2>&1; then npm install -g npm@latest; else if command -v node >/dev/null 2>&1; then npm install -g npm@latest; else sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y nodejs npm; fi; fi
commands.remove: echo 'npm is part of Node.js. Remove Node.js to remove npm.'
commands.update: if command -v npm >/dev/null 2>&1; then npm install -g npm@latest; fi

commands.install: if command -v python3 >/dev/null 2>&1; then python3 -m ensurepip --upgrade && python3 -m pip install --upgrade pip; else sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y python3 python3-pip; fi
commands.remove: echo 'pip is part of Python. Remove Python to remove pip.'
commands.update: if command -v python3 >/dev/null 2>&1; then python3 -m pip install --upgrade pip; fi
